channel.title: Good Web Hosting Provider with free vB License?
channel.description:
I found a website, http://glowhost.com with a free vBulletin license, but it is limited do space. I want an unlimited host with vBulletin for around $20 a month. Any ideas? Spent 15 minutes googling :(
EDIT: I use hosting24, and I am VERY satisfied and happy with it. The customer service time is about 5-30 minutes. I just wanted a cheap/free vBulletin license.

item.title: Good Web Hosting Provider with free vB License?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote="(Anthony), post:3, topic:346068"][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=442447.msg3249363#msg3249363 date=1277619888]
vB alone is more then that, but a unlimited webhost can be like $5 at 000webhost; although it is of poor quality.
[/quote]
Unlimited is never truly unlimited.[/quote]Yea.

Read full topic
item.source: Good Web Hosting Provider with free vB License?
